title: The Undertaker
info: The Undertaker is one of the earliest obtainable guns, and is the Crimson's counterpart to the Corruption's Musket. Similar to the Musket, The Undertaker (along with 100 Musket Balls) will always drop from the first Crimson Heart destroyed in a Crimson world. It can also be found in Crimson Crates (16.67% chance), which are obtained by fishing in the Crimson.
